long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
ğŸ’¡ Features
âœ“ Export comments from Facebook.
âœ“ Export replies from Facebook.
âœ“ CSV, XLSX and JSON formats support.
âœ“ Exported data includes: type, user_name, comment_text, comment_html, attachments, comment_id, parent_id, comment_depth, replies_count, user_id, profile_url, profile_picture, is_verified, unified_reactors, and created_at.

âš™ï¸ Get Started
1. Enter the URL of the Facebook post.
2. Click the 'Export' button.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
Your data privacy is paramount. All data processing occurs on your local machine; it never transits through our servers, ensuring no one else has access to your collected data.

ğŸ’¡ Caratteristiche
âœ“ Esporta commenti da Facebook.
âœ“ Esporta risposte da Facebook.
âœ“ Supporto per formati CSV, XLSX e JSON.
âœ“ I dati esportati includono: tipo, user_name, comment_text, comment_html, allegati, comment_id, parent_id, comment_depth, replies_count, user_id, profile_url, profile_picture, is_verified, unified_reactors e created_at.

âš™ï¸ Inizia

2. Clicca il pulsante 'Esporta'.

ğŸ”’ Privacy dei Dati
La vostra privacy dei dati Ã¨ fondamentale. Tutto il processamento dei dati avviene sulla vostra macchina locale; non transita mai attraverso i nostri server, garantendo che nessun altro abbia accesso ai vostri dati raccolti.
